title: ICE on save_anlaysis signature generation for StructVariant in Enum

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-save-analysis
labels.description: Area: saving results of analyses such as inference and borrowck results to a file.

body:
### Code ```Rust enum TestEnum { Field { test_field: String }, } fn main(){ () } ``` ### Meta ``` RUST_BACKTRACE=1 RUST_SAVE_ANALYSIS_CONFIG='{"output_file":null,"full_docs":true,"pub_only":false,"reachable_only":false,"distro_crate":false,"signatures":true,"borrow_data":false}' rustc ~/Downloads/crash.rs -Z save_analysis ``` ``` nightly-2020-07-12 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustc_save_analysis/sig.rs:677:36 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: backtrace::backtrace::libunwind::trace at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.46/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:86 1: backtrace::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.46/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66 2: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:78 3: ::fmt at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59 4: core::fmt::write at src/libcore/fmt/mod.rs:1076 5: std::io::Write::write_fmt at src/libstd/io/mod.rs:1537 6: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:62 7: std::sys_common::backtrace::print at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:49 8: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}} at src/libstd/panicking.rs:198 9: std::panicking::default_hook at src/libstd/panicking.rs:217 10: rustc_driver::report_ice 11: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook at src/libstd/panicking.rs:530 12: rust_begin_unwind at src/libstd/panicking.rs:437 13: core::panicking::panic_fmt at src/libcore/panicking.rs:85 14: core::panicking::panic at src/libcore/panicking.rs:50 15: ::make 16: ::visit_item 17: rustc_save_analysis::dump_visitor::DumpVisitor::process_crate 18: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 19: rustc_session::utils::::time 20: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::enter_global 21: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 22: rustc_span::with_source_map 23: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 24: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. ```
